overview: “Prior to his appointment at Authentium, Carlisle (Kirk) Kirkpatrick worked with Seisint, where he was responsible for organizing the company’s initial public offering prior to its acquisition by Lexis-Nexis. Prior to working at Seisint, Mr. Kirkpatrick was a principal at Accenture Technology Ventures. At Accenture, he worked in all phases of venture capital investment with a focus on Enterprise Software. Prior to working at Accenture, Mr. Kirkpatrick worked at Illinova as Corporate Development Manager, and at Pepsico as their Senior Financial Analyst.” (Source: Authentium)
